sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_96f7616d136176007e94fc5ed144b087
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function TabChartSelector(spUtil) {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;

  spUtil.get('pe-donut-chart-wizard', {
    primary_color: c.data.chart_1.primary_color,
    background_color: c.data.chart_1.background_color,
    chart_width: c.data.chart_1.chart_width,
    font_size: c.data.chart_1.font_size,
    font_weight: c.data.chart_1.font_weight,
    chart_data: c.data.chart_1.data
  }).then(function (response) {
    c.data.embedded_widget_1 = response;
  });

  spUtil.get('pe-donut-chart-wizard', {
    primary_color: c.data.chart_2.primary_color,
    background_color: c.data.chart_2.background_color,
    chart_width: c.data.chart_2.chart_width,
    font_size: c.data.chart_2.font_size,
    font_weight: c.data.chart_2.font_weight,
    chart_data: c.data.chart_2.data
  }).then(function (response) {
    c.data.embedded_widget_2 = response;
  });


  c.selectedTab = 'unaccounted';

  c.second_tab = {
      name: "expiring lease",
      badge_number: 5,
      badge_color: "bg-orange",
      list: [{
        icon: "#icon-azure",
        company: "Azure",
        lease: "Jan 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM1",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "edward",
          lname: "scott",
          name: "Edward Scott",
          photo: "47161dae1358fe00f7f5bcc32244b03c.iix",
          title: "IT Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM23",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "Andrew",
          lname: "Garner",
          name: "Jose Riley",
          photo: "90f8d5621398fe00f7f5bcc32244b00b.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM13",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "jose",
          lname: "riley",
          name: "Jose Riley",
          photo: "fae1fa1013d07e00f7f5bcc32244b091.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS",
        lease: "Feb 25 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM4",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "greg",
          lname: "hill",
          name: "Greg Hill",
          photo: "743a51a21398fe00f7f5bcc32244b067.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS",
        lease: "Feb 35 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM5",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "David",
          lname: "Hoffman",
          name: "David Hoffman",
          photo: "22d959621398fe00f7f5bcc32244b0d2.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS",
        lease: "Feb 45 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM6",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "Gary",
          lname: "Kim",
          name: "Gary Kim",
          photo: "61ba9d621398fe00f7f5bcc32244b023.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"
        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-azure",
        company: "Azure",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM17",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "edward",
          lname: "scott",
          name: "Edward Scott",
          photo: "47161dae1358fe00f7f5bcc32244b03c.iix",
          title: "IT Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-azure",
        company: "Azure",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM18",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "edward",
          lname: "scott",
          name: "Edward Scott",
          photo: "47161dae1358fe00f7f5bcc32244b03c.iix",
          title: "IT Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-vmware",
        company: "VMW",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM39",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "jose",
          lname: "riley",
          name: "Jose Riley",
          photo: "fae1fa1013d07e00f7f5bcc32244b091.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }, {

        icon: "#icon-vmware",
        company: "VMW",
        lease: "Feb 5 2017",
        vimnumber: "VM10",
        vim_number: "",
        user: {
          fname: "jose",
          lname: "riley",
          name: "Jose Riley",
          photo: "fae1fa1013d07e00f7f5bcc32244b091.iix",
          title: "Application Manager",
          phone: "8581234567"

        }
      }]
    },

    c.userOne = {
      fname: "jose",
      lname: "riley",
      name: "Jose Riley",
      photo: "fae1fa1013d07e00f7f5bcc32244b091.iix",
      title: "Application Manager",
      phone: "8581234567",

      spending: [

        {
          text: "$8K this month",
          icon: "#icon-aws",
          company: "AWS"
        }, {
          text: "$22K this month",
          icon: "#icon-azure",
          company: "Azure"
        }
      ]
    };
  c.userTwo = {
    fname: "edward",
    lname: "scott",
    name: "Edward Scott",
    photo: "47161dae1358fe00f7f5bcc32244b03c.iix",
    title: "IT Manager",
    phone: "8581234567",

    spending: [

      {
        text: "$7K this month",
        icon: "#icon-aws",
        company: "AWS"
      }, {
        text: "$13K this month",
        icon: "#icon-azure",
        company: "Azure"
      }
    ]
  };


}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.unaccounted-vms {
  background: #F7F7F7;
  padding: 20px;
  .green-bg {
    background: #70be5a;
  }
  .second-tab-details {
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    .flex-it {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: space-around;
      .svg-icon {
        height: 23px;
        width: 27px;
        fill: #9C9C9C;
      }
      p {
        margin-left: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
    }
    p {
      margin-bottom: 0px;
    }
    .vm-num {
      .big-text {
        font-size: 20px;
        color: #595959;
      }
      .small-text {
        font-size: 13px;
        color: #909090;
      }
    }
    .lease {
      .lease-head {
        text-transform: uppercase;
      }
      .big-text {
        font-size: 20px;
        color: #595959;
      }
      .small-text {
        font-size: 13px;
        color: #909090;
      }
    }
    .people-card-media {
      padding-right: 10px;
      padding-left: 10px;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: flex-start;
      align-items: center;
      float: left;
      margin: 0px;
      width: initial;
      .flex-it-align-top {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
      }
      .media-left {
        //  width: 60px;
        .list__photo {
          width: 35px;
          height: 35px;
        }
        .initials-badge {
          min-width: 36px;
          float: left;
          margin-top: 0px;
          border-radius: 50%;
          line-height: 1;
          font-size: 14px;
          margin-left: 0px;
          padding: 10px 10px;
          font-weight: 300;
          background: #AEB2B3;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  .people-card-media {
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    background: #fff;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
    margin: 0px;
    .flex-it-align-top {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .webicon-down {
      fill: transparent;
      stroke: $brand-primary;
      width: 22px;
      height: 22px;
      vertical-align: bottom;
    }
    .media-body {
      width: 60%;
    }
    .media-left {
      //  width: 60px;
      .list__photo {
        width: 35px;
        height: 35px;
      }
      .initials-badge {
        min-width: 36px;
        float: left;
        margin-top: 0px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        line-height: 1;
        font-size: 14px;
        margin-left: 0px;
        padding: 10px 10px;
        font-weight: 300;
        background: #AEB2B3;
      }
      .not-available.presence:after {
        background-color: #FA5B5A;
      }
      .available.presence:after {
        background-color: #7CE684;
      }
      .presence {
        position: relative;
      }
      .presence:after {
        width: 10px;
        height: 10px;
        top: 26px;
        left: 25px;
        position: absolute;
        content: "";
        border-radius: 50%;
      }
    }
    .media-right {
      text-align: center;
      width: 40%;
      .fa-color {
        color: #3d5483;
        margin-right: 10px;
      }
      .add-unnssigned {
        font-size: 30px;
        color: $brand-primary;
      }
    }
    .people_name_title {
      .title {
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
        color: #666;
        //font-weight: 300;
      }
      .list__subtitle {
        font-size: 14px;
        font-family: 'Lato', sans-serif;
        font-weight: 300;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
        color: #565656;
      }
      .list__sub_subtitle {
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: 300;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
        color: #9f9f9f;
      }
    }
    .list__body {
      //width: 200px;
    }
    .contact-div {
      clear: both;
    }
  }
  .red-bg {
    background: #ee525e;
  }
  .body-div {
    background: #fff;
    .heading {
      font-weight: 600;
      font-size: 24px;
      color: #333;
      padding: 10px;
    }
    .spending-month {
      display: flex;
      .first-div {
        width: 50%;
        //background: #ececec;
        padding: 20px;
        border-right: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
        &.active {
          background: #f2f2f2;
          border-bottom: 2px solid #d1232b;
        }
        .top-box {
          height: 70px;
          text-align: center;
          .big-text {
            font-size: 46px;
            font-weight: 300;
            text-align: center;
          }
        }
        .sub-title {
          font-size: 12px;
          font-weight: 600;
          text-transform: uppercase;
          color: #9f9f9f;
          margin-bottom: 0px;
          margin-top: 10px;
          text-align: center;
        }
      }
      .second-div {
        border-right: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
        // background: #ececec;
        width: 50%;
        padding: 20px;
        &.active {
          background: #f2f2f2;
          border-bottom: 2px solid #d1232b;
        }
        .top-box {
          height: 70px;
          text-align: center;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          margin-top: 3px;
          .arrow-down {
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-left: 10px solid transparent;
            border-right: 10px solid transparent;
            border-top: 10px solid #70be5a;
          }
          .arrow-up {
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-left: 10px solid transparent;
            border-right: 10px solid transparent;
            border-bottom: 10px solid #ee525e;
          }
          .badge-custom {
            padding: 16px 6px;
            font-size: 24px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: 300;
            margin-left: 10px;
          }
          .big-text {
            font-size: 46px;
            font-weight: 300;
            text-align: center;
          }
        }
        .sub-title {
          font-size: 12px;
          font-weight: 600;
          text-transform: uppercase;
          color: #9f9f9f;
          margin-bottom: 0px;
          margin-top: 7px;
          text-align: center;
        }
      }
    }
  }
  .spending-foruser {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 10px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f3f3f3;
    .left-text {
      font-size: 20px;
      color: #595959;
      p {
        margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
    }
    .right-text {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      font-size: 16px;
      color: #9c9c9c;
      .svg-icon {
        height: 23px;
        width: 27px;
        fill: #9C9C9C;
      }
      p {
        margin-left: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
    }
  }
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>pe-tab-chart-selector-snippet</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>PE Tab Chart Selector Snippet</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function () {
  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */
  data.chart_1 = {
    primary_color: '#29bd00',
    background_color: '#b4b2b3',
    chart_width: '70',
    font_size: '18px',
    font_weight: '600',
    data: {
      label: '$50k',
      current: 50,
      total: 200
    }
  };

  data.chart_2 = {
    primary_color: '#f5a623',
    background_color: '#b4b2b3',
    chart_width: '70',
    font_size: '18px',
    font_weight: '600',
    data: {
      label: '10',
      current: 10,
      total: 20
    }
  };


})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fabio.petito</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-16 19:02:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>96f7616d136176007e94fc5ed144b087</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PE Tab Chart Selector Snippet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_96f7616d136176007e94fc5ed144b087</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fabio.petito</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-17 01:23:44</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>

    <symbol id="icon-vmware" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" fill-rule="evenodd">

              id="Fill-5"></path>
            <path d="M49.3436322,9.33788506 L49.3436322,9.29052874 C49.3436322,6.77834483 51.4194943,5.43995402 54.4378851,5.43995402 C55.9606437,5.43995402 57.0434023,5.64777011 58.1063908,5.94891954 L58.1063908,5.53236782 C58.1063908,3.38937931 56.7886897,2.28133333 54.5546667,2.28133333 C53.3551264,2.28133333 52.6567356,2.43443678 51.7794943,2.82478161 C51.6654713,2.87167816 51.5491494,2.89512644 51.4590345,2.89512644 C51.0434023,2.89512644 50.6742069,2.548 50.6742069,2.1342069 C50.6742069,1.76593103 50.8342069,1.5388046 51.1588046,1.39489655 C52.3321379,0.885471264 53.2181149,0.715816092 54.7385747,0.715816092 C56.4208736,0.715816092 57.711908,1.15213793 58.5868506,2.02937931 C59.3937471,2.83627586 59.8102989,3.98891954 59.8102989,5.51029885 L59.8102989,12.0886897 C59.8102989,12.5944368 59.4415632,12.9645517 58.9542069,12.9645517 C58.4498391,12.9645517 58.1063908,12.5944368 58.1063908,12.1342069 L58.1063908,10.9962759 C57.2755862,12.0813333 55.8902989,13.0491494 53.7965057,13.0491494 C51.5813333,13.0491494 49.3436322,11.7811034 49.3436322,9.33788506 M58.128,8.41558621 L58.128,7.26248276 C57.2507586,7.00914943 56.0737471,6.75351724 54.6227126,6.75351724 C52.3891494,6.75351724 51.1417931,7.72409195 51.1417931,9.22110345 L51.1417931,9.26754023 C51.1417931,10.7654713 52.5247816,11.6417931 54.139954,11.6417931 C56.328,11.6417931 58.128,10.3043218 58.128,8.41558621"
              id="Fill-7"></path>
            <path d="M3.25503448,1.46229885 C2.86422989,0.606206897 1.89963218,0.21816092 0.998482759,0.61954023 C0.0964137931,1.02 -0.23554023,2.02 0.172275862,2.87747126 L3.9548046,11.0990805 C4.5502069,12.3887356 5.17733333,13.0641379 6.35388506,13.0641379 C7.61135632,13.0641379 8.1594023,12.3285057 8.75388506,11.0990805 C8.75388506,11.0990805 12.0536552,3.91425287 12.0862989,3.83977011 C12.1203218,3.76344828 12.226069,3.53126437 12.5621609,3.53310345 C12.8458391,3.53632184 13.0844598,3.76206897 13.0844598,4.06505747 L13.0844598,11.0926437 C13.0844598,12.1754023 13.6858391,13.0641379 14.8412414,13.0641379 C15.9957241,13.0641379 16.620092,12.1754023 16.620092,11.0926437 L16.620092,5.34367816 C16.620092,4.23471264 17.4145747,3.51517241 18.4973333,3.51517241 C19.5805517,3.51517241 20.3010115,4.25954023 20.3010115,5.34367816 L20.3010115,11.0926437 C20.3010115,12.1754023 20.9042299,13.0641379 22.0577931,13.0641379 C23.2122759,13.0641379 23.8394023,12.1754023 23.8394023,11.0926437 L23.8394023,5.34367816 C23.8394023,4.23471264 24.6311264,3.51517241 25.7152644,3.51517241 C26.7961839,3.51517241 27.5194023,4.25954023 27.5194023,5.34367816 L27.5194023,11.0926437 C27.5194023,12.1754023 28.1212414,13.0641379 29.2761839,13.0641379 C30.4297471,13.0641379 31.0564138,12.1754023 31.0564138,11.0926437 L31.0564138,4.5491954 C31.0564138,2.14413793 29.1230805,0.45954023 26.7961839,0.45954023 C24.4715862,0.45954023 23.015954,2.06781609 23.015954,2.06781609 C22.2426207,1.0645977 21.175954,0.46137931 19.3708966,0.46137931 C17.4665287,0.46137931 15.7994023,2.06781609 15.7994023,2.06781609 C15.0251494,1.0645977 13.7069885,0.46137931 12.615954,0.46137931 C10.9281379,0.46137931 9.58790805,1.20390805 8.76997701,3.07333333 L6.35388506,8.76804598 L3.25503448,1.46229885 Z"
              id="Fill-9"></path>
          </g>
        </g>
      </g>
    </symbol>
  </svg>
  <div class="unaccounted-vms row">
    <div class="body-div">
      <div class="spending-month">
        <div class="first-div" ng-class="{'active': c.selectedTab =='unaccounted' }" ng-click="c.selectedTab = 'unaccounted'">
          <div class="top-box">
            <sp-widget widget="c.data.embedded_widget_1"></sp-widget>
          </div>
          <p class="sub-title">
            {{c.unaccountedData.first_box.sub_title}}
          </p>
        </div>
        <div class="second-div" ng-class="{'active': c.selectedTab == 'noncomplaint' }" ng-click="c.selectedTab = 'noncomplaint'">
          <div class="top-box">
            <sp-widget widget="c.data.embedded_widget_2"></sp-widget>
          </div>
          <p class="sub-title">
            {{c.unaccountedData.second_box.sub_title}}
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div ng-show="c.selectedTab == 'unaccounted'">
        <people-card type="mem" user="c.userOne"></people-card>
        <div ng-repeat="spend in c.userOne.spending" class="spending-foruser">
          <p class="left-text">{{spend.text}}</p>
          <div class="right-text">
            <svg class="svg-icon">
              <use xlink:href='{{spend.icon}}'></use>
            </svg>
            <p>{{spend.company}}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
        <people-card type="mem" user="c.userTwo"></people-card>
        <div ng-repeat="spend in c.userTwo.spending" class="spending-foruser">
          <p class="left-text">{{spend.text}}</p>
          <div class="right-text">
            <svg class="svg-icon">
              <use xlink:href='{{spend.icon}}'></use>
            </svg>
            <p>{{spend.company}}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div ng-show="c.selectedTab == 'noncomplaint'">
        <div class="second-tab-details" ng-repeat="each in c.second_tab.list" ng-class-even="'light-grey-bg'">
          <div class="vm-num">
            <p class="big-text">{{each.vimnumber}}</p>
            <p class="small-text">{{each.vim_number}}</p>
          </div>
          <div class="lease">
            <p class="lease-head">created on</p>
            <p class="small-text">{{each.lease}}</p>
          </div>


          <div class="flex-it">
            <svg ng-class="{'vmwwidth': each.company == 'VMW'}" class="svg-icon">
              <use xlink:href='{{each.icon}}'></use>
            </svg>
            <p ng-if="each.company != 'VMW'">{{each.company}}</p>
          </div>

        </div>
      </div>

    </div>
  </div>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_0bc1804513293600d15e3d7ed144b0f2
sys_update_xml.payload: c.div-center { text-align: center; }sp_instancefalsepe-donut-chart-wizardfalsePE Donut Chart Wizard[{"name":"chart_data","default_value":"{\"label\":\"1/5\",\"current\":1,\"total\":5}","label":"Chart Data","type":"json","mandatory":true},{"name":"primary_color","default_value":"#4286f4","label":"Color","type":"string"},{"name":"background_color","default_value":"#c2d1e8","label":"Background Color","type":"string"},{"name":"chart_width","default_value":"80","label":"Width","type":"string"},{"name":"font_size","default_value":"24px","label":"Font Size","type":"string"},{"name":"font_weight","default_value":"800","label":"Font Weight","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetfabio.petito2017-03-14 22:19:08true0bc1804513293600d15e3d7ed144b0f2148PE Donut Chart Wizardglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_0bc1804513293600d15e3d7ed144b0f2fabio.petito2017-03-16 18:59:18

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_362c548113693600d15e3d7ed144b0c1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>/* Donut CSS */

.progress-pie-chart {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: #E5E5E5;
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.progress-pie-chart.gt-50 {
    background-color: #81CE97;
}

.ppc-progress {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    border-radius: 50%;
    left: calc(50% - 50px);
    top: calc(50% - 50px);
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    clip: rect(0, 100px, 100px, 50px);
}

.ppc-progress .ppc-progress-fill {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    border-radius: 50%;
    left: calc(50% - 50px);
    top: calc(50% - 50px);
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    clip: rect(0, 50px, 100px, 0);
    background: #81CE97;
    transform: rotate(60deg);
}

.gt-50 .ppc-progress {
    clip: rect(0, 50px, 100px, 0);
}

.gt-50 .ppc-progress .ppc-progress-fill {
    clip: rect(0, 100px, 100px, 50px);
    background: #E5E5E5;
}

.ppc-percents {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    border-radius: 50%;
    left: calc(50% - 80px/2);
    top: calc(50% - 80px/2);
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    background: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    display: table;
}

.ppc-percents span {
    display: block;
    font-size: inherit;
    color: #81CE97;
}

.pcc-percents-wrapper {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
}</css><name>donutDirective</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fabio.petito</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-15 00:14:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>362c548113693600d15e3d7ed144b0c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>donutDirective</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_362c548113693600d15e3d7ed144b0c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fabio.petito</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-15 00:39:00</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_25689c0113693600d15e3d7ed144b0d6
sys_update_xml.payload: truefalsedonutDirectivesys_ui_scriptfabio.petito2017-03-14 23:57:37true25689c0113693600d15e3d7ed144b0d62donutDirectiveglobalfalseglobalsys_ui_script_25689c0113693600d15e3d7ed144b0d6fabio.petito2017-03-15 00:38:49false
